Protection of SMC Evaluations
Protection under
38 U.S.C. 110
and
38 CFR 3.951(b)
applies to grants of special monthly compensation (SMC).
Although SMC is an ancillary benefit, it is compensation and the legislative intent of
Public Law (PL) 102-86
amendments to
38 U.S.C. 110
was to extend the 20-year protection principle to SMC evaluations.
